content: now also available for free https //www mariskavos nl/free-mummy-cat-crochet-pattern/ halloween is kiki the cat s favorite day of the year this year she dressed up as a scary mummy she makes such a cute couple with scary pumpkin you can make this cat from any yarn if your use thicker yarn your amigurumi will turn out a larger size skill level intermediatte if you have any questions please let me know this pattern is written in english us terms french german and dutch © 2021 diy fluffies mariska vos-bolman - all rights reserved you may sell the finished items provided you give the credit to mariska vos-bolman diy fluffies as the designer you may not sell or share the pattern have fun crocheting pattern bundle buy 4 patterns get 1 free place five patterns in your cart to receive this discount
